Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Southbound Reroute near Archer/47th
ShortDescription: Southbound 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Kedzie, 55th, Pulaski and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Kedzie, 55th, Pulaski and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/47th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
